column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I'd like to take the time to thank you for your continued patronage of Jinya Ramen Bar.  I noticed you gave us multiple 5-star reviews and we greatly appreciate that.  It's not often we have guests that take the time to give us such high marks.  That really means a lot to my staff because we work day in and day out to make sure we are giving our guests the best possible experience at Jinya Ramen Bar.
